name: sd-checkout-code
command: echo Cloning github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide, on branch branchName && if git --version > /dev/null 2>&1; then export GIT_WRAPPER=""; else export GIT_WRAPPER="sd-step exec core/git"; fi && if [ ! -z $SCM_CLONE_TYPE ] && [ $SCM_CLONE_TYPE = ssh ]; then export SCM_URL=git@github.com:screwdriver-cd/guide; elif [ ! -z $SCM_USERNAME ] && [ ! -z $SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN ]; then export SCM_URL=https://$SCM_USERNAME:$SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN@github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide; else export SCM_URL=https://github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide; fi && $GIT_WRAPPER "git clone --quiet --progress --branch branchName $SCM_URL $SD_SOURCE_DIR" && $GIT_WRAPPER "git reset --hard 12345" && echo Reset to 12345 && echo Setting user name and user email && $GIT_WRAPPER "git config user.name sd-buildbot" && $GIT_WRAPPER "git config user.email dev-null@screwdriver.cd" && export GIT_URL=$SCM_URL.git && export GIT_BRANCH=origin/branchName
